General.Name: Iris Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Iris Acquisition Corp does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was formerly known as Tribe Capital Growth Corp I and changed its name to Iris Acquisition Corp in July 2022. Iris Acquisition Corp was incorporated in 2020 and is based in George Town, Cayman Islands.
General.Address: 2700 19th Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94110
